content.rendered:
Directed by Ugla HauksdÃ³ttir. Logan Kibens. Lisa Gunning. Neasa Hardiman. Shannon Murphy.

Written by Naomi Alderman. Naomi Alderman. Naomi Alderman. Naomi Alderman. Naomi Alderman. Sarah Quintrell. Sarah Quintrell. Claire Wilson. Claire Wilson. Claire Wilson. Raelle Tucker. Raelle Tucker. Brennan Elizabeth Peters. Michelle Hsu. Stacy Osei-Kuffour.

Cast Ria Zmitrowicz (Roxy Monke). Halle Bush (Allie). Auli’i Cravalho (Jos Cleary-Lopez). Toheeb Jimoh (Tunde). John Leguizamo (Rob). Nico Hiraga (Ryan). Heather Agyepong (Ndudi). Zrinka Cvitesic (Tatiana Moskalev). Alice Eve (Kristen). Josh Charles (Governor Daniel Dandon). Rob Delaney (Tom). Mezi Atwood (Sandra). Edwina Findley (Helen). Daniela Vega (Sister Maria). Gerrison Machado (Matty Clearly-Lopez). Gary McDonald (Big Frank). Pietra Castro (Izzy Cleary-Lopez). Elise Robertson (Mrs. Montgomery). Ashley De Guzman (Yuki). Precious Mustapha (Marissa). Anissa Matlock (Cat Cole). Alexandru Bindea (Viktor Moskalev). Peyvand Sadeghian (Kimaya).

Language English.

Producers Tim Bricknell. Naomi De Pear. Jane Featherstone. David Higginson. Frank Murray. Tina Oswald. Steve Searle. Raelle Tucker. Sarah Wheale. Shawn Williamson. Claire Wilson. Sarah Quintrell. Naomi Alderman. Sue Chung. Ugla HauksdÃ³ttir. Brennan Elizabeth Peters. Johnny Rayner.

Production Amazon Studios. Sister Pictures.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 9

Status On Going (2023–)
